item.description:
This trail begins on an old logging road and eventually turns into a steep ascent to the summit. The overall rating is moderate, but it's realistically a pairing of two separate grades. One-way distance is 3.4 miles. Remember to prepare for chilly weather, especially with wind! Information and map here: http://www.vtstateparks.com/pdfs/coolidge_hiking.pdf

Afterward, we can do lunch at Long Trail or somewhere else nearby.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Hike the Bucklin Trail on Killington
